title: Sound 3: /t/ (ت)
description: Hear the soft /t/ and match it to the two-dot shape.
objective: Strengthen awareness of the /t/ sound by linking audio to the correct letter shape.

activities.prompt: Play the sound. Tap the shape that matches /t/.
Find the shape with two dots for the gentle /t/ sound.
Listen and repeat /t/ with a light tap of your tongue.
